item.title: Experiments in code, generative art in Javascript
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Have fun wih Javascript is possible! In this talk we will presents some Javascript experiments for generative art projects. Generative art refers to art that in whole or in part has been created with the use of an autonomous system. Using simple algorithms and the power of Javascript, HTML5 and CSS3 we will show some […]
item.content:encoded: Have fun wih Javascript is possible! In this talk we will presents some Javascript experiments for generative art projects. Generative art refers to art that in whole or in part has been created with the use of an autonomous system. Using simple algorithms and the power of Javascript, HTML5 and CSS3 we will show some creative code to perform generative art on the web. We will present some librarires such as processing.js, D3.js, Paper.js, three.js and RaphaÃ«l.
